home.review1Text: Exceptional quality and professional service. The aluminum facade exceeded our expectations.
home.review2Text: Outstanding craftsmanship and attention to detail. Highly recommended for premium projects.
home.review3Text: Professional team with excellent technical expertise. Delivered on time and within budget.

about.title: About Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting
about.subtitle: Excellence in Aluminum & Glass Solutions
about.description: At Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting, we are dedicated to providing superior aluminum and glass solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted partner in the industry.
about.whoWeAreDesc1: Welcome to Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting, your trusted partner in aluminum, glass, and metalwork solutions. With years of experience, we specialize in designing and delivering high-quality aluminum facades, cladding, structural systems, and advanced architectural finishes that combine beauty and durability.
about.whoWeAreDesc2: At Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting, we provide complete solutions in aluminum, glass, steel, and architectural aluminum systems. Our team is dedicated to delivering excellence in everything we do â€“ from concept to execution.
servicesList: Modern architectural facades and curtain walls
Stylish and durable glass balustrades and stair railings
Custom glass partitions using tempered and securit glass
capabilitiesList: Interior and exterior metalwork including iron details
High-precision tempered glass and securit installations
about.servicesFooter: Whether you're building a residential villa or a commercial tower, we tailor our aluminum and metal solutions to your specific vision.
about.ceoQuote: We always strive to pioneer in our field and work hard to provide high quality products and services that meet the needs of our customers. We also pay great attention to developing the skills of the work team in order to ensure excellence in performance and maintain the trust of our valued customers with whom we work closely to ensure that we meet their expectations and achieve the best results. We always strive to provide excellent service and innovative solutions to achieve full satisfaction for our customers. Thus, we extend a word of thanks and appreciation to the work team that works diligently every day to achieve the goals of our company and its vision to be the leader in our field.

about.resourcesSubtitle: Understanding the role of aluminum, glass, and architectural facades in shaping modern construction in Saudi Arabia
about.vision2030Desc1: The Kingdom's strategic vision focuses on innovation, sustainability, and smart construction. These principles align closely with Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting's commitment to delivering high-performance aluminum facades, glass cladding, and structural curtain wall systems.
about.vision2030Desc2: Our advanced aluminum and glass solutions contribute to the modernization of cities and iconic architectural landmarks across the Kingdom.
about.glassInnovationsDesc1: Discover the latest and newest advancements in tempered glass (securit), architectural glazing, and eco-friendly glass technologies.
about.glassInnovationsDesc2: Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting integrates these innovations into projects such as cladded facades, glass railings, and energy-efficient windows and doors to meet modern performance and green building design standards.
about.futureVisionDesc: We aim to lead the market in aluminum, metal, and glass innovation in the region. Through cutting-edge technologies and a commitment to quality, we help architects and developers bring their projects to life with standout architectural facades, curtain walls, and customized aluminum systems.
about.ctaDescription: Contact us now to request a quote or consultation! Our work stands out across residential and commercial projects, thanks to our solid reputation and commitment to innovation.
about.trustedByArchitectsDesc: We've partnered with architects, builders, and engineers to create long-lasting aluminum and glass structures. We have a strong cadre with practical experience and high qualifications.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Aluminum & Glass Solutions
services.windowsDesc: We provide aluminum sliding, hinged, tilt-hinged, and fixed windows â€” stylish, durable, and energy-efficient for any space.
services.doorsDesc: We offer a variety of doors to suit every architectural style: Hinged, Bathroom, Sliding, Automatic, and Folding doors.
services.frontsDesc: Create a bold first impression with our facade systems: Structural, Curtain Wall, and Frameless fronts.
services.shutterDesc: We deliver high-quality shutters for security and comfort: Manual, Electric, Remote Control, and Smart Home systems.
services.claddingDesc: Our fire-resistant cladding panels provide both safety and beauty, perfect for commercial and residential projects.
services.showerDesc: Elegant and functional shower designs: Hinged, Sliding, and Fixed shower systems.
services.handrailDesc: Safety meets style with our handrails: Suspended Glass and Metal handrail systems.
services.whyChooseUs: Why Choose Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting
services.whyChooseDesc: With years of experience in aluminum fabrication, we ensure every project meets the highest quality standards. We work closely with clients to customize each solution, ensuring it fits their needs and budget.
services.overviewDescription: Our comprehensive range of aluminum and glass solutions is designed to meet the diverse needs of modern construction projects. From residential homes to commercial complexes, we provide innovative, durable, and aesthetically pleasing solutions that stand the test of time.
services.discoverOurLatest: Discover our latest completed projects and see the quality of our work firsthand. From concept to completion, we deliver excellence in every project.

staff.title: Our Working Staff
staff.subtitle: The Bedrock of Al Fouad Company's Excellence
staff.description: Al Fouad Company for Aluminum and PVC Contracting prides itself on a highly skilled working staff whose expertise is foundational to our success. Our team's international experience in aluminum, glass, cladding, curtain wall, structural systems, doors, and windows ensures that each project meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.
staff.meetExperts: Meet the Experts Who Make It Happen
staff.engineeringDesc: From conceptualizing curtain wall fronts to detailing doors, windows, and cladding systems, our engineers turn ideas into reality.
staff.productionDesc: Our manufacturing team transforms raw aluminum and glass into robust components, including structural systems and stylish facade panels.
staff.installationDesc: Precision and care define our on-site teams handling assemblies of doors, windows, shutters, and handrails.
staff.qualityDesc: Ensuring each productâ€”whether a glass partition or a clad facadeâ€”passes rigorous checks before reaching you.
staff.logisticsDesc: Skilled in timely dispatch and installation across residential and commercial environments.
staff.whyOurPeople: Why Our People Make the Difference
staff.deepExpertiseDesc: A blend of local industry knowledge and global best practices in aluminum and glass systems.
staff.collaborativeDesc: Working closely with clients from conceptual stages to final installations of cladding, doors, and windows.
staff.relentlessQualityDesc: Every facetâ€”from material selection to executionâ€”is meticulously reviewed for durability and design excellence.
staff.clientCentricDesc: Tailored solutions that adapt to project needs, whether for innovative facades or functional interior systems.
staff.collaborativeApproachDesc: We work closely with architects, engineers, and clients to ensure seamless project execution and exceed expectations.
staff.clientCentricFocusDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We tailor our services to meet your specific needs and deliver exceptional results.
staff.teamDescription: Our diverse team brings together decades of experience in aluminum, glass, and architectural systems.
